remarks: Exchange property for span of a pair with negated membership.  TODO: look at uses of ~ lspexch to see if this will shorten proofs. (Contributed by NM, 24-May-2015.)
statement:
lspexchn2.v $e |- V = ( Base ` W ) $.
lspexchn2.n $e |- N = ( LSpan ` W ) $.
lspexchn2.w $e |- ( ph -> W e. LVec ) $.
lspexchn2.x $e |- ( ph -> X e. V ) $.
lspexchn2.y $e |- ( ph -> Y e. V ) $.
lspexchn2.z $e |- ( ph -> Z e. V ) $.
lspexchn2.q $e |- ( ph -> -. Y e. ( N ` { Z } ) ) $.
lspexchn2.e $e |- ( ph -> -. X e. ( N ` { Z , Y } ) ) $.
lspexchn2 $p |- ( ph -> -. Y e. ( N ` { Z , X } ) ) $.
